column2: "Ah, hello again. We seem to meet often."
"I was just wondering why you joined ARKS? Uh, I don't mean that in a bad way, I was just wondering..."
"It's just that I managed to join too, and I don't seem suited for it at all..."
"My friend's always saying that she wants to become an ARKS member, except she has no talent at all.."
"The fact that I was able to become an ARKS member and she can't just doesn't seem fair..."
"If possible I'd like to trade places, but I guess that's not possible..."
"I wonder why I was able to become an ARKS member when she's the one who really wanted to?"
